about_the_game:
With no nation, and no doctrine to follow, the allegiance of Soldiers of Fortune is to the highest bidder. They come at a cost, but their services are priceless. Are you ready to pay for their unique expertise?

This pack includes:


  • Soldier of Fortune (Fleur-de-lis) Uniform set
  • Tactical Headset (Fleur-de-lis) Headgear set
  • Mirrorshades (Gold)
  • 3x SVU
  • Snow Black skin for SVU
  • 100x ammo: 7.62x54
  • 3x Bugle F1
  • Nebula skin for Bugle F1
  • 100x ammo: 5.56x45 NATO
  • 3x M249
  • Leopard skin for M249
  • 300x ammo: 5.56x45 NATO
  • 3x Berry M12
  • Rectangle Brown skin for Berry M12
  • 100x ammo: 9x19 Parabellum
  • 3x La Chiave 12
  • Flecktarn 84 skin for La Chiave 12
  • 50x ammo: Shotgun Shell
  • 10x Adrenaline Shot
  • 10x M67 Frag Grenade
  • 10x M84 Flash Grenade
  • 200x Crowns

This pack may only be purchased once per account and is available for a limited time.

With no nation, and no doctrine to follow, the allegiance of Soldiers of Fortune is to the highest bidder. They come at a cost, but their services are priceless. Are you ready to pay for their unique expertise?

This pack includes:

short_description: With no nation, and no doctrine to follow, the allegiance of Soldiers of Fortune is to the highest bidder. They come at a cost, but their services are priceless. Are you ready to pay for their unique expertise?
